title.rendered: Until 12/24 – FREE Gift Cards & Toys Promos!

content.rendered:
Gift Card Promotion

Don’t miss out on this deal! This is the last chance to receive a FREE $10 gift card for every $25 gift card you buy. Gift cards redeemable after 12/25/2017; limit of 10 free cards. Gift cards spend like cash. Offer available at all four Gottwals Books locations.

 

Toy Sale: Buy 3 get 1 FREE

Don’t be late! Stock up for Christmas with this amazing toy promotion. Our Buy 3, Get 1 Free sale goes through Christmas Eve. This promo includes ALL toy lines. Offer available at all four Gottwals Books locations.

 

Christmas Hours

All four of our locations will be closed Christmas day. We will resume regular business hours on December 26th.

 

Macon Display

Check out this amazing display done by our folks at the Macon store!

Give the gift of reading this holiday season! We have a wide selection of new and used titles to gift your favorite book lover. Not sure what book to get? Take advantage of our ongoing gift card deal! From now through 12/24, get a FREE $10 gift card with every $25 gift card you buy.

 

New Stock

The Civil War was the first major conflict to be recorded by cameras and men such as Mathew Brady, George Barnard and Timothy O’Sullivan made their names by capturing unforgettable images of death and destruction. This book uses many of these photographers’ classic images and revisits the sites to show how they look today. Arranged chronologically, the book begins with the attack on Fort Sumter in 1861, journeys through the major battle sites in Virginia, and ends at Appomattox Court House in 1865, with the epitaph of the Lincoln assassination. Priced at $15.97, no further discounts can be applied.

 

Elf on the Shelf

Keep the Elf on the Shelf tradition alive in your homes this Christmas season. Buy this brand NEW set that includes the classic picture book and your very own Elf! It’s only $19.97 (MSRP $30+).
